reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Establishing Monitoring and Evaluation mechanisms for the Cross-government Prosperity Fund

description.narrative: To design and procure monitoring and evaluation systems for the Prosperity Fund. This will provide specialist skills to programmes and enable effective portfolio management at Fund level. We will use this system to help drive value for money and effective delivery of the Fund's objectives

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
